fullText:
Secret Recovery

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Drow
Benefit: When you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, you can as a free action shift 1 square and make a Stealth check to hide if you have superior cover or total concealment.


Revision (2/24/2010)
Change benefit to read â€œWhen you succeed on a saving throw to end an effect, you can as a free action shift 1 square and make a Stealth check to hide if you have superior cover or total concealment.

Published in Dragon Magazine 382, page(s) 67.
name: Secret Recovery
